transcript: one of my team asked me this he was like what do you tell somebody who is boring he's like you're just like interesting I was like I don't think that's true I think that people suppress themselves because they're afraid of other people's judgment I think people would do more things that are more like them if they weren't afraid of looking different like the point isn't to stand out the point is just do you and because everyone else doesn't do them you will stand out as a result but it's more the outcome than it is the desired result
